content: crochet baby blanket pattern * **for the pdf** version follow this link https //www etsy com/uk/listing/680683731/ 1 * **for a free pattern** please follow this link https //messyyarn blogspot com/2024/04/soothing-waves-baby-blanket-crochet html 2 ♥ us crochet terms ♥ pdf pattern - instant download ♥ 75 x 60 cm 23 6 by 30 inches ♥ 100% merino ♥ 100% hand-made wrap your little one in this beautiful merino baby blanket it will make a lovely gift for the new arrival yarn drops big merino or any yarn you like hook size 6mm h8 - this is a guide only drops big merino 380 gr 8 balls 50 gr each 50gr ball length is 75 meters size of the blanket 60cm by 76cm 23 6 by 29 9 inches slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet chst = chain stitch double_crochet = double_crochet rs = right side ws = wrong side notes for the pattern **note 1 ** if you decide to crochet a different number of figures you need to allow 17 stitches for one wave and add 3 stitches at the end for example if you would like to have 5 repeats then multiply 17 times 5 which gives 85 stitches to these 85 stitches you need to add 3 more which brings you to chain of 88 **note 2 ** when working on a row with double_crochet the very first chain does not count as a stitch that means you start the row by chain 1 or 2 whichever seems better and does not pull the side i did ch1 but with thinner yarn you may need ch2 after that chain you will work the very first double_crochet in the very first stitch i crochet this way to avoid gaps at the start of the row 1 https //www etsy com/uk/listing/680683731/ 2 https //messyyarn blogspot com/2024/04/soothing-waves-baby-blanket-crochet html
